metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44488 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
VP9 in libvpx before 1.13.1 mishandles widths, leading to a crash related to encoding.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-44488` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvpx7 - 1.11.0-2ubuntu2.2
vpx-tools - 1.11.0-2ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
libvpx package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.11.0-2ubuntu2.2').
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
